INSERT INTO MATTERS_STORE_IOS ( ID, MATTERS_NO, MATTERS_NAME, TYPE_ID, NORMS, PARAM, MODEL_DESC, BRAND, MATERIAL, LEVEL, UNIT, FACTORY, CUR_AMOUNT, ADV_AMOUNT, PUR_AMOUNT, WEIGHT, METTER_WEI, STORE_ID, IOS_DESC, VERSIONS, IS_MIDPROD, STATUS, SECURE_STOCK, BEF_DATE, BULIDDATE, LOSEDATE, DELETED, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, COMPANY_ID, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mattersNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mattersName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{norms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{material,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{curAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{advAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{purAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{metterWei,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{iosDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isMidprod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secureStock,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{befDate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{buliddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{losedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_MATTERS_STORE_IOS.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE MATTERS_STORE_IOS
MATTERS_NO = #{mattersNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATTERS_NAME = #{mattersName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MATERIAL = #{material,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CUR_AMOUNT = #{curAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADV_AMOUNT = #{advAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PUR_AMOUNT = #{purAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
METTER_WEI = #{metterWei,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
IOS_DESC = #{iosDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSIONS = #{versions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_MIDPROD = #{isMidprod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SECURE_STOCK = #{secureStock,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BEF_DATE = #{befDate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
BULIDDATE = #{buliddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOSEDATE = #{losedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
